healverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a healing aura

GuantSlice.name: Guant Slice
GuantSlice.desc: Note to self: Do not trust Urban Dictionary, even if it's the only place where you can find a definition for a word.

RapidJab.name: RapidJab

RSPE01_One.name: <:Wii_Disc:968656346587205653> Wii Sports (Boxing)
RSPE01_One.desc:
Title ID: RSPE01

For this skill, the Wii plugs a Nunchuk into the Wii Remote and goes into Boxing. From there, two transparent boxing gloves surround the controller and accessory; and hit one opponent three times. To be precise, a straight jab from the Remote, then a hook from the Nunchuk and an uppercut from the Remote to finish. This is one of the only Titles where the Wii does not need to wait a turn for.

AwakenSlap.name: Awaken Slap
AwakenSlap.desc: A bold slap to one foe's face in an attempt to wake them up.

Multi-Hit.desc: Deal light Strike damage on one foe up to 7 times with this Perception-dependent technique

PissedFist.name: Pissed Fist

The end...

of April FOOLS DAY LMAO GOTTEMMMMM

MirthStrike.name: Mirth Strike

HyperSlide.name: Hyper Slide

~~uwu~~

The strongest Technique in Lamonka, as of 19/02/2022. It is exclusive to the Physical type Main Character, or MC.

The trident afterward gravitates back to the user as if they never threw it.

LITTLE DOES THE OPPOSING TEAM KNOW, THE HUG GENERATES THE ENERGY OF 5000 SUNS AND SPONTANEOUSLY RELEASES IT IN ONE COLOSSAL EXPLOSION. The user also gets caught up in their own explosion, fainting them in the process.

Sky's100thSkillCelebration.name: Sky's 100th Skill Celebration
Sky's100thSkillCelebration.desc: This skill was made to commemorate Sky's achievement for reaching the 100-custom skills milestone.

Annoy.name: Annoy
Annoy.desc: The user annoys a foe because they are a real meanie >:(

Shit.name: Shit
Shit.desc: The user shits on the floor in front of them. Disgusting...

MadTeaParty.name: Mad Tea Party
MadTeaParty.desc:
[TAKEN FROM SMT NINE]
Inflicts sleep to all foes and allies.

ColdBreath.name: Cold Breath
ColdBreath.desc: The user blows cold breath to those around them. May freeze the target.

ClangorousSoul.name: ClangorousSoul
ClangorousSoul.desc: Raise all of user's stats at the cost of HP.

Dekaja.name: Dekaja

Savisukaja.name: Savisukaja
Savisukaja.desc: The user strengthens their own accuracy by one stage.

Sarakukaja.name: Sarakukaja
Sarakukaja.desc: The user strengthens their own defense by one stage.

Labyrinth.name: Labyrinth
Labyrinth.desc: One of the spells of a certain Doppelganger. It is an echo skill of Mind Blast.

Eclipse.name: Eclipse
Eclipse.desc: One of the spells of a certain human(?) girl with magic powers. The user gathers dark-based magic power to increase defense by one stage.

BubbleShield.name: Bubble Shield
BubbleShield.desc: A good old Bubble Shield from '94.

WhirlwindShield.name: Whirlwind Shield
WhirlwindShield.desc: The user protects an ally with a shield of wind.

Satarukaja.name: Satarukaja
Satarukaja.desc: The user buffs their own attack by one stage.

UnheardPrayer.name: Unheard Prayer
UnheardPrayer.desc: Let the pleas of your foes fall on deaf ears, for their help shall turn away, blinded by ego

IchorBlast.name: Ichor Blast
IchorBlast.desc: Terraria reference The user summons Ichor to douce and weaken a foe's defense by two stages.

BloodBlind.name: Blood Blind
BloodBlind.desc: The user splashes their own blood onto the target's eyes, blinding the latter and lowering their perception.

BloodDrainage.name: Blood Drainage
BloodDrainage.desc: Using their own blood, the user pierces a hole into a foe to reduce their foe's strength.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.desc: The user summons an undead animal.

HAGE.name: <:Wii_Channel:969134672741294090> News Channel
HAGE.desc:
Title ID: HAGE
This Title is defunct on normal Wiis due to its service being shut down. However, this Wii can summon things so it's not hard to believe that it could access this title and use a different server for magical properties.

Shocking news envelops a foe, resulting in a decent chance to cause Fear.

HAFE.name: <:Wii_Channel:969134672741294090> Forecast Channel
HAFE.desc:
Title ID: HAFE
This Title is defunct on normal Wiis due to its service being shut down. However, this Wii can summon things so it's not hard to believe that it could access this title and use a different server for magical properties.

A cloud is summoned above the battlefield, pouring rain upon the fight below it. Changes Weather to Rain.

StrengthArise.name: StrengthArise
StrengthArise.desc: Gain strength for infatuating an enemy.

HAYA.name: <:Wii_Channel:969134672741294090> Photo Channel+
HAYA.desc:
Title ID: HAYA
[Update v1.1 for Title with ID: HAAA]

For this skill, the Wii briefly summons a generic camera, taking a picture of one foe; this has a great chance to stun the foe. Then the camera disappears, leaving only the SD card; which is then inserted into the Wii. This saves an image of the foe, however it is redundant for the skill itself. Maybe it could be useful for the Journal?

HAAA.name: <:Wii_Channel:969134672741294090> Photo Channel
HAAA.desc:
Title ID: HAAA

For this skill, the Wii briefly summons a generic camera, taking a picture of one foe; this has a decent chance to stun the foe. Then the camera disappears, leaving only the SD card; which is then inserted into the Wii. This saves an image of the foe, however it is redundant for the skill itself. Maybe it could be useful for the Journal?

HydroHeartShield.name: HydroHeartShield
HydroHeartShield.desc: A heart of water gets copied from the enemy, which is painful, to surround itself around all allies.

Mini-Bomb.name: Mini-Bomb
Mini-Bomb.desc: A weaker version of Self-Destruct, designed for those at lower levels. Does not down the user, but takes a good chunk of HP away, however this skill can deal a critical hit.

SuperCoolHealingSpell.name: Super Cool Healing Spell

HealingLight2.name: Healing Light (Sun of Hopes)

Dream.name: Dream

This Title is defunct on normal Wiis due to its service being shut down. However, this Wii can summon things so it's not hard to believe that it could access this title and use a different server for magical properties.

MultiIII.name: Multi III

AbsoluteMana.name: AbsoluteMana
AbsoluteMana.desc: The user of this skill absolutely may go insane with spellcasting, for their MP shall recover in full, and twofold on the next turn!

ElusionCounterattack.name: Elusion Counterattack
ElusionCounterattack.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 25%, and counters them with a slash type skill with 150 power. Modified by <:passive:962465469942616074>SpiritCharge.

InvigIII.name: Invigorate III
InvigIII.desc: The user recovers 8% of their Max MP at the start of every turn.

GuardianHand.desc: Make your Melee Attack a Magic skill.

AttackAll.name: Attack All
AttackAll.desc: Make your Melee Attack a Multi-Target skill.

PlotArmor.name: Plot Armor
PlotArmor.desc: You have acheived the power of the plot armor.

DistortionCounter.name: Distortion Counter
DistortionCounter.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 15%, and counters them with a slash type skill with 100 power. Modified by <:passive:962465469942616074>SpiritCharge.

RegenII.name: Regenerate II
RegenII.desc: The user recovers 6% of their Max HP at the start of every turn.

AlterPain.name: Alter Pain
AlterPain.desc: Gain a small amount of MP after taking damage, relative to the damage taken.

InvigI.name: Invigorate I
InvigI.desc: The user recovers 3% of their Max MP at the start of every turn.

RegenI.name: Regenerate I
RegenI.desc: The user recovers 3% of their Max HP at the start of every turn.

MultiII.name: Multi II
MultiII.desc: The user has a 30% chance to hit two extra times whenever they are attacking.

Teamwork.name: Teamwork
Teamwork.desc: When an ally assists the user by buffing or shielding them, their teamwork point count raises by 1 and maxes at 8. When the battle ends the user's teamwork point count resets to 0.

SpiritCharge.name: Spirit Charge
SpiritCharge.desc: When an ally assists Sky by healing him, his spirit power increments by 1 and maxes at 10. When the battle ends, Sky's spirit power resets to 0.

ShadowCounter.name: Shadow Counter
ShadowCounter.desc: Delve into the shadows to avoid physical attacks and counter them 20% of the time.

CruelCounter.name: Cruel Counter
CruelCounter.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 15%, and counters them with a pierce type skill.

ProjectileRedirection.name: Projectile Redirection
ProjectileRedirection.desc: A Passive Skill that stops time to repel Magic Attacks that are Strike, Pierce or Slash, back at the opponent.

SharpParry.name: Sharp Parry
SharpParry.desc: Parry physical attacks 25% of the time.

WonderGuard.name: Wonder Guard
WonderGuard.desc: The user is immune to all attacking skills they are not weak to.

HighCounter.name: HighCounter
HighCounter.desc: High chance of countering physical attacks. When countering, a heavy punch/kick is sent as a form of retaliation.

VagabondEdge.name: Vagabond Edge
VagabondEdge.desc: The user's dagger and shortsword become polished, and their skills improve with experience and dedication, therefore boosting slash-type attacks in power by 30%.

AnimePowerplay.name: Anime Powerplay
AnimePowerplay.desc: The user's magic gets more potent as they take more damage that maxes when you reach half of your HP.

AnimeInstinct.name: Anime Instinct
AnimeInstinct.desc: Old Sky's exclusive ability. His instincts become even sharper so that his body automatically dodges magic attacks on it's own. (30% Dodge Chance)

NeedForSpeed.name: Need For Speed
NeedForSpeed.desc: The user seems to faze out of reality and reappear away from the immediate danger of the attacker's physical attacks 30% of the time. (Nothing personal Spectra)

EvadePhys.name: Evade Physical
EvadePhys.desc: A Passive Skill that greatly raises evasion chance against physical skills.

PsyAmp.desc: A Passive Skill that boosts Psychic Type Skills by 30%.
PsyAmp.name: PsyAmp

IronKnuckle.name: IronKnuckle
IronKnuckle.desc: The user's fist hardens when using strike-type skills, to buff them by 30%.

SaiyanPride.name: A Saiyan's Pride!
SaiyanPride.desc: The pride within you invigorates your will, healing 30 MP each turn.

Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.desc: The thrill of combat makes user's Physical attacks gain up to 50% of power as they lose HP

Float.name: Float
Float.desc: The user floats during the battle and manages to dodge attacks 25% of the time.

MoodSwing.name: MoodSwing
MoodSwing.desc: The user's mood changes every turn, becoming 15% stronger and 15% weaker per turn.

SpreadMelee.name: SpreadMelee
SpreadMelee.desc: Makes your melee attack target all enemies.

FastRecovery.name: Fast Recovery
FastRecovery.desc: The user has 20% chance to recover from status effects at the start of their turn

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.desc: The user deals 20% more damage, but also takes 20% more damage

InstantTransmission.name: Instant Transmission
InstantTransmission.desc: The user places two fingers on their forehead, teleporting away from physical attacks 20% of the time.

BlastBoost.name: BlastBoost
BlastBoost.desc: The user's explosive attacks gain a 15% gained boost of damage.

SoulBoost.name: SoulBoost
SoulBoost.desc: The user's spirit is hardened and able to do 15% more damage than usual.

SlashBoost.name: SlashBoost
SlashBoost.desc: The user's Slash Type Skills are boosted by 15%.

PolishedBlade.name: Polished Blade
PolishedBlade.desc: The user's dagger/shortsword becomes sharper, and therefore boosts slash-type attacks in power by 15%.

Crouch.name: Crouch
Crouch.desc: The user remembers they can just crouch under the opponent's magic. They somehow only remember to do it 15% of the time however.

Duck.name: Duck
Duck.desc: The user remembers they can just duck under the opponent's punches. They somehow only remember to do it 15% of the time however.

AnimeSense.name: Anime Sense
AnimeSense.desc: Old Sky's exclusive ability. His senses increase so that his body automatically dodges magic attacks on it's own. (15% Dodge Chance)

SmallFrame.name: SmallFrame
SmallFrame.desc: Due to the user's abnormally small body, be it height or weight wise, it causes attacks to sometimes not hit. Only happens 15% of the time, though.

TimeDeflection.name: Time Deflection
TimeDeflection.desc: The user takes out a nova pocket watch as they seem to appear just out of range of the attacker's physical attacks 15% of the time.

LastBreath.name: Last Breath
LastBreath.desc: The user's Sacrifice skills have their power boosted by 15%

HolyBarrier.name: Holy Barrier
HolyBarrier.desc: The user has a barrier of holy energy that shrouds them in a mist that may disorient mages to miss the user 15% of the time.

MentalSwitch.name: MentalSwitch
MentalSwitch.desc: Morisonu's emotions switch from his calm to aggressive states every 3 turns, but with a 10% increase and decrease with its change.

TeleportationDodging.name: TeleportationDodging
TeleportationDodging.desc: The user uses their teleportation powers to dodge basically anything that the opponent attacks them with. there's a very slim chance to even hit the user who has this passive. NOTE: THIS PASSIVE IS INTENDED FOR CHARACTERS THAT HAVE ONLY 1 HP. LIKE SANS AND MOBITALE HARC FOR EXAMPLE. DO NOT USE THIS PASSIVE ON ANY OTHER CHARACTER AS THIS WILL MAKE THEM EXTREMELY OP

PierceAll(Incomplete).name: Pierce All (Incomplete)
PierceAll(Incomplete).desc: An incomplete technique that allows bypassing enemy Resist affinities

PierceAll(Weak).name: Pierce All (Weak)
PierceAll(Weak).desc: An advanced technique that allows bypassing enemy Resist affinities and reducing their Block, Repel and Drain affinities to Resist

Snipe.name: Snipe
Snipe.desc: Inflicts light unavoidable Pierce damage on one enemy

YouDefinitelyLose.name: YouDefinitelyLose
YouDefinitelyLose.desc: Yep your team is definitely gone once this move is used.

BuiltDifferent.name: Assembled in a way that puts one on a higher grade of spectrum
BuiltDifferent.desc:
Constructed Contrastingly
Built Different
Created Distinctive
The `flambé` to your iced tea
Manufactured in a unique fashion

powerverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a power aura

Armageddon.name: Armageddon
Armageddon.desc: In the end... Everything was blown away...

SuperFightingGameComboButIKeepDroppingIt.name: Super Fighting Game Combo
SuperFightingGameComboButIKeepDroppingIt.desc: I swear guys I'll actually land it this time lemme try again just watch please I can do it I swear-

GoombaMarch.name: GoombaMarch
GoombaMarch.desc: Bowser uses ten Goombas to strike a singular foe, but they're so stupid that they're not likely to hit often or even to burn at that.

FuryAssault.name: Fury Assault
FuryAssault.desc: The user attacks the foe with all the punches and kicks they have..lowering their endurance once they are done.

AbsoluteKnockout.name: Absolute Knockout
AbsoluteKnockout.desc: An upgrade to RapidTornado. This one performs eight sweeps in a clockwise, blur-like motion.

HACA.name: <:Wii_Channel:969134672741294090> Mii Channel
HACA.desc:
Title ID: HACA

For this skill, the Wii enters the Mii Parade. The battlefield turns into a weird variant of the Plaza and a couple of randomly generated Miis run, trodding right on every enemy present. The accuracy is quite low because the Miis can be spaced out a lot from each other. All Miis in that Parade get deleted after the attack, so a turn is needed to collect more Miis.

NeoWolfFangFist.name: Neo Wolf Fang Fist
NeoWolfFangFist.desc: A move from Yamcha himself, but you'd probably live long enough to actually use it, lmfao. Use your fists to strike the opponent and send them back with a mighty finishing punch

Diary.name: Diary
Diary.desc: The user summons a diary and slaps an enemy with it 3 times. Has a 7% chance to cause dizziness.

CometStomp.name: CometStomp
CometStomp.desc: The user jumps on the enemy a whopping SIX times. Miniscule chance to cause DIZZY. (Based on Paper Mario's jump action in Mario & Luigi: Paper Jam when he has all of his clones)

Tsuda.name: Tsuda
Tsuda.desc: An assassination technique that damages bones and internal organs without breaking the skin

PlumberStomp.name: Plumber Stomp
PlumberStomp.desc: The user jumps on the enemy a total of two times. The second hit is slightly stronger than the first.

BlurKicks.name: Blur Kicks
BlurKicks.desc: The user whips out their legs to an enemy's face to rapidly kick 6 times, causing a blur around the user's bottom limbs.

MillionKick.name: Million Kick
MillionKick.desc: Focus your power in a lightning-fast flurry of kicks! Your enemy stands no chance!

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.desc: The user jumps on the enemy once.

BodyRam.name: Body Ram
BodyRam.desc: The user rams themselves into a foe. Simple enough, but not very powerful.

Fastclaws.name: Fastclaws
Fastclaws.desc: Rapid weak attack with the intent of inflicting bleed status to an objective, can only be performed by creatures or people with claws, be it biological or artifical

WormDagger.name: WormDagger
WormDagger.desc: The user takes out a dagger made of worms and slashes at the opponent several times. It has poor accuracy, at the cost of the amount of hits and power it has. As the attack goes on, worms start to fall off of the dagger, reducing the power of your hits.

ThunderGodDance.name: Thunder God Dance
ThunderGodDance.desc: A mystical set of sword slashes.

EjectButton.name: ⏏️ Eject
EjectButton.desc: The Wii ejects its disc in a violent manner, shooting it at one foe. The disc itself is spinning, causing five hits and a small chance to bleed; however, the console needs to reinsert the disc afterwards, skipping its next turn.

SpinSlash.name: Spin Slash
SpinSlash.desc: It inflicts damage on all foes surrounding the user.

XCut.name: X Cut
XCut.desc: The user cuts the foe twice creating a X shaped cut in them.

Crossfire.name: Crossfire
Crossfire.desc: The user shoots their foes. If the user has teammates and none of them are down, they assist the user, adding 50% more power to this skill

Hyper-Shot.name: Hyper-Shot
Hyper-Shot.desc: Infuse 3 bullets with your lifeforce, striking a selected foe.

PointShot.name: PointShot
PointShot.desc: The user stabs the target with high precision.

ZaShottogan.name: Za Shottogan
ZaShottogan.desc: The user fires a scatter-shot weapon 6 times. It has awful accuracy

SegmentStab.name: SegmentStab
SegmentStab.desc: The user pierces the target twice with high accuracy.

FinalExplosion.name: Final Explosion
FinalExplosion.desc: The user warns their teammates of an impending explosion and tells them to get away, however the user stays in place while their teammates flee. The user then starts pouring all of their energy and life force into the air around them, of which creates a glowing sphere of energy around them, before then detonating all of their energy into an explosive wave of energy that envelops the opposing team and eviscerates them into nothingness. Due to the burden this puts on the user's body from expending all of their life force, they die after using this move.

PKFire-Alpha.name: PK Fire α
PKFire-Alpha.desc: The user fires flames at every foe, rarely burning them.

WandOfFireBlast.name: Wand of FireBlast
WandOfFireBlast.desc: Fires a blast of fire that explodes in the foes' faces, probably burning most of them too

WaterGun.name: WaterGun
WaterGun.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

RagingCurrents.name: Raging Currents
RagingCurrents.desc: A wave of hilariously wide proportions. This move is more of a status move with extra damage than anything; There's a 10% chance it will cause Dizzy, a 20% chance it will debuff the opponent's Precision, and an even lower chance it'll do both. Go ahead, flip that tidal coin.

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.desc: The user rolls up a snowball and throws it at the target. It's not the most accurate, though...

IceFlowerFreeze.name: IceFlowerFreeze
IceFlowerFreeze.desc: [Exclusive to the Ice Flower] Five consecutive hand-thrown iceballs at one enemy. Great chance of causing FREEZE, and hits four times but doesn't deal that much damage.

SnowStorm.name: SnowStorm
SnowStorm.desc: The user casts a storm of ice at all foes that occasionally freezes them.

Chaos.name: Chaos
Chaos.desc: One of the spells of a certain Doppelganger. It is an echo skill of Ice Storm.

SnowGrave.name: SnowGrave
SnowGrave.desc: The user casts a powerful storm of ice at all foes that may freeze them. The user has to rest before fighting again.

PowderSnow.name: PowderSnow
PowderSnow.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing foes.

ZiEAverse.name: ZiEAverse
ZiEAverse.desc: Purchase this DLC to deploy an electrical damage-spreading field around the foes

spreadverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a spread aura

Thunderhand.name: Thunderhand
Thunderhand.desc: A jolt of high-power electricity granted from a moon-like god. This move cannot crit, but it has a fairly high chance of paralyzing the foe.

AerialCut.name: Aerial Cut
AerialCut.desc: The user manipulates the air around them to deal light Wind damage to one foe.

GEAruverse.name: GEAruverse
GEAruverse.desc: Purchase this DLC to employ a healing wind around the foes

healverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a healing aura

AirSlash.name: Air Slash
AirSlash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target bleed.

PKGround-Pi.name: PK Ground π
PKGround-Pi.desc: The user casts a powerful controlled earthquake that damages a single foe 5 times and sometimes paralyzes them, it is able to bypass any Counter.

PKGround-Gamma.name: PK Ground γ
PKGround-Gamma.desc: The user casts a powerful earthquake that damages random foes 5 times and sometimes paralyzes them, it is able to bypass any Counter.

Bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
Bonemerang.desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

BulletSeed.name: BulletSeed
BulletSeed.desc: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

LeafyKunai.name: Leafy Kunai
LeafyKunai.desc: The user throws 5 kunais made of leaves at the target.

healverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a healing aura

PSIRockin-Alpha.name: PSIRockin-Alpha
PSIRockin-Alpha.desc: It's a psychokinetic wave generated by concentration that deals an enemy minor damage.

SpectralLatch.name: SpectralLatch
SpectralLatch.desc: The user creates a psychical latch, grabs the foe and throws them into the ground, usually paralyzing them.

Diarrhea.name: Diarrhea
Diarrhea.desc: The user... oh my god The user has massive diarrhea all over an enemy, with a chance to poison them. Unfortunately, the diarrhea also debuffs the user's endurance once.

RadiationStrike.name: RadiationStrike
RadiationStrike.desc: Slashes the foe with the power of uranium, weakening the foe.

GearGrind.name: Gear Grind
GearGrind.desc: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

Rajinodyne.name: Rajinodyne
Rajinodyne.desc: Heavy metal damage to one random target.

Bamudoon.name: Bamudoon
Bamudoon.desc: The user casts an unstable demonic spell with the power to instantly down fighters 25% of the time.

DespairScatter.name: DespairScatter
DespairScatter.desc: The user fires small beams towards all foes with their weapon/hand, the beams may inflict despair on the foes.

MamEAdo.name: MamEAdo
MamEAdo.desc: Purchase this DLC for a small chance to Kill multiple targets

MEAdo.name: MEAdo
MEAdo.desc: Purchase this DLC for a small chance to Kill one target

Mudo.name: Mudo
Mudo.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foe 15% of the time.

MamEAdoon.name: MamEAdoon
MamEAdoon.desc: Purchase this DLC for a medium chance to Kill multiple targets

MEAdoon.name: MEAdoon
MEAdoon.desc: Purchase this DLC for a medium chance to Kill one target

Mamudoon.name: Mamudoon
Mamudoon.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foes 35% of the time.

Mudoon.name: Mudoon
Mudoon.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foe 35% of the time.

DieForMe.name: Die For Me!
DieForMe.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foes 80% of the time.

SHIT.name: SHIT
SHIT.desc: The user uses the power of SHITTING to take an advantage to a number two of a battle

FurryAssault.name: Furry Assault
FurryAssault.desc: The user attacks the foe via the tactic we will refrain from disclosing. While the user becomes more vulnerable in the process, the targeted foe may gain a hard-to-resist urge to kill themselves

WeakestPunch.name: WeakestPunch
WeakestPunch.desc: The user punches the target as weak as possible. The target then gets confused as to why the user didn't use their full potential.

Haggle.name: Haggle
Haggle.desc: Strike a deal with one enemy. Who knows, maybe you'll get something good out of it...

Chase.name: Chase
Chase.desc: Let multiple Grassimps chase after your foes.

RapidTornado.name: RapidTornado
RapidTornado.desc: An upgrade to Cool Breakdance. This one performs four sweeps in a clockwise motion.

Cometfall.name: Cometfall
Cometfall.desc: The opposing team is bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

BraveSlap.name: Brave Slap
BraveSlap.desc: The user uses the power of their bravery to deliver a slap. Critical hits land more easily.

Cometdrop.name: Cometdrop
Cometdrop.desc: The target is bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Slide.name: Slide
Slide.desc: The user does a slide on the ground into the opponent to deal damage. The user is low enough on the ground to avoid traps and barriers while attacking.

MagicPunch.name: MagicPunch
MagicPunch.desc: The user uses magic to summon a punch.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.desc: The user charges towards the foe, and lunges at them to attack using their head.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.desc: Inflicts HP-dependant Strike damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times

FurDriver.name: Fur Driver
FurDriver.desc: A trail of leaves follows behind the user as they charge toward the target, and then sucker punches them.

WolfFangFist.name: Wolf-Fang Fist
WolfFangFist.desc: The user channels Wolf-like energy into their fists, punching the enemy in a three hit combo.

RSPE01_All.name: <:Wii_Disc:968656346587205653> Wii Sports (Bowling)
RSPE01_All.desc:
Title ID: RSPE01

For this skill, the Wii goes into Bowling. A blue, red, green or yellow bowling ball is rolled from in front of the console with a low chance of hitting; but the blow if it hits is powerful. This is one of the only Titles where the Wii does not need to wait a turn for, although it is quite costly.

Meteorfall.name: Meteorfall
Meteorfall.desc: The opposing team is strongly bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Meteordrop.name: Meteordrop
Meteordrop.desc: The target is strongly bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

MusclePunch.name: Muscle Punch
MusclePunch.desc: Inflicts Strike endurance-dependent damage on a single enemy.

AgileStrike.name: AgileStrike
AgileStrike.desc: The user strikes at a high speed. Damage is dependant on Agility.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.desc: The user fakes out the target, before bypassing their defenses and sucker punching them in their blindspot. This skill bypasses Protect skills like Protect, Makarakarn, Tetrakarn & Web Trap.

UnseenStrike.name: UnseenStrike
UnseenStrike.desc: The user strikes in a way that can bypass physical counters and may inflict dizzy on the foe.

DarkestLariat.name: Darkest Lariat
DarkestLariat.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target

MarrowMash.name: MarrowMash
MarrowMash.desc: The user strikes the foe twice with a swinging bone, with a moderate chance of inflicting Daze.

PKPunch-Beta.name: PK Punch β
PKPunch-Beta.desc: The user casts a force that strikes the foe as if it was a punch, the force usually finds the foe's weak spot.

PKPunch-Alpha.name: PK Punch α
PKPunch-Alpha.desc: The user casts a force that strikes the foe as if it was a punch.

LightSpeedAttack.name: LightSpeedAttack
LightSpeedAttack.desc: The user revs up a spindash for a moment, summoning orbs after a few seconds. Releasing the spin charge activates the Light Speed Attack, an evolved homing attack.

LonelyKick.name: LonelyKick
LonelyKick.desc: The user jumps and quickly kicks the foe with enough strength to confuse the foe's senses, sometimes enough to inflict dizziness on the foe. Due to the amount of space this skill requires it's more effective when the user is alone or the last one standing.

AggressionBash.name: AggressionBash
AggressionBash.desc: The user puts their own Ego into this attack, possibly making the targeted person also getting some Ego 1/4th of the time.

DeterminationPunch.name: Determination Punch
DeterminationPunch.desc: The user uses the power of their determination to deliver a strong punch. Critical hits land more easily.

RockPunch.name: Rock Punch
RockPunch.desc: A skill from a certain human girl who's great at martial arts. The user punches the target with force great enough to shatter boulders.

TanukiFist.name: Tanuki Fist
TanukiFist.desc: The user seemingly disappears with leaves falling from where the user once was, before reappearing in front of the target and driving their fist into them.

LonelyCrash.name: LonelyCrash
LonelyCrash.desc: A declarative strike that gets 50% stronger when the user is the last one standing, or is alone.

RallyCrash.name: Rally Crash
RallyCrash.desc: An inspirational strike that gets 50% stronger when the user has at least all of their allies backing them up

Last-Resort.name: Last Resort [Pkmn]
Last-Resort.desc: The user uses this as a last resort skill. Requires less than 40% of the user's current MP to use. This skill cannot miss.

AxeCrash.name: Axe Crash
AxeCrash.desc: The user somersaults and smashes the heel of their foot down on the target's head.

IllusionForce.name: Illusion Force
IllusionForce.desc: The user creates an illusion of themselves, using it as a distraction to charge in and heavily smash their fist into the target. This skill bypasses defensive skills like Shields, Magic Barriers, and Traps.

HermesHammer.name: Hermes' Hammer
HermesHammer.desc: The user jumps high in the air and majestically somersaults in the air before smashing their heel on the target's head with perfect form.

VacuumWave[Pkmn].name: Vacuum Wave [Pkmn]
VacuumWave[Pkmn].desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target.

RoadRoller.name: Road Roller
RoadRoller.desc: WRYYYYYY IS THAT A JOJO REFEREEEEEENCE

BoneAblaze.name: Bone Ablaze
BoneAblaze.desc: The user sets their weapon or item alight an strikes twice by swinging their bone at the foe. This skill can inflict either burning or daze.

PhantasmicKiller.name: Phantasmic Killer
PhantasmicKiller.desc: The user holds up a spell card, of which causes an endless surge of knives to start orbiting around the user, and then fly towards the opposing side, covering them in a tsunami of blades.

ThousandCuts.name: Thousand Cuts
ThousandCuts.desc: Execute one enemy with a thousand of extremely weak slashes

FewSwipes.name: FewSwipes
FewSwipes.desc: The user slashes only a few times. It ain't as good but it'll do.

MadCut.name: Mad Cut
MadCut.desc: The user puts their rage into a slash. This buffs the user's attack after use.

SliceAway.name: SliceAway
SliceAway.desc: The user wildly slashes 3 random foes.

VShine.name: V Shine
VShine.desc: The user slashes downwards and then upwards in a V pattern

XChop.name: X Chop
XChop.desc: The user cuts the foe twice creating a X shaped wound in them.

John.name: John
John.desc: HARC WHY DID YOU TRAP ME IN A SKILL

RainR_Die.name: Scythe of the Reckoning (RainR_Die)
RainR_Die.desc: A (usually) lethal slice that reduces its target to purple dust. The scythe's special properties leave the target with burn 50% of the time, but if it doesn't kill then no extra damage is dealt beyond the burn.

TwinSlash.name: Twin Slash
TwinSlash.desc: The user slashes at the opponent two times in quick succession.

SlashAway.name: SlashAway
SlashAway.desc: The user wildly strongly slashes 3 random foes.

Gamer'sClaw.name: Gamer'sClaw
Gamer'sClaw.desc: Boasts about gaming skills and then slashes the foe

HolyClaws.name: HolyClaws
HolyClaws.desc: The user gets help with some luck from whatever god they manage to find in a world, then does a decent scratch which is decently powerful.

WornDagger.name: Worn Dagger
WornDagger.desc: The user takes out their worn, but still sharp dagger and slashes at the opponent. This attack's power scales with the user's level.

CleaveAway.name: CleaveAway
CleaveAway.desc: The user very strongly lacerates 3 random foes and rarely makes them bleed.

XSlash.name: X Slash
XSlash.desc: The user slashes the foe twice creating a X shaped wound in them.

Belt.name: Belt
Belt.desc: The user summons a belt and uses it to slap the opponent up to three times. Has a chance to inflict Fear.

GrandHaloBlade.name: Grand Halo Blade
GrandHaloBlade.desc: The user unsheathes their sword at incredible speed at dead-range of the adversary, unleashing a combo of three strikes with enough power to bust them to shreds.

HaloBump.name: Halo Bump
HaloBump.desc: The user unsheathes their sword at incredible speed at dead-range of the adversary, unleashing an overhead strike with enough power to bust them to shreds.

JackRipper.desc: A move used by Sakuya that launches 5 high velocity knives at a random opponent's path that can miss.
JackRipper.name: Jack Ripper

BrutalHit.name: Brutal Hit
BrutalHit.desc: Inflicts moderate HP-dependent Slash damage on one enemy

Hassohappa.name: Hassohappa
Hassohappa.desc: Inflicts moderate HP-dependent Slash damage on all enemies

UnseenSlashes.name: Unseen Slashes
UnseenSlashes.desc: The user slashes the enemy 3 times at a speed so fast, it's barely visible. This skill has a very low chance of inflicting bleed, as well as buffing agility.

XLacerate.name: X Lacerate
XLacerate.desc: The user lacerates the foe twice cresting a X shaped wound and rarely making them bleed.

PKSlash-Beta.name: PK Slash β
PKSlash-Beta.desc: The user casts a force that slashes the foe twice, sometimes in their weak spot.

FinalStrike.name: FinalStrike
FinalStrike.desc: The user slashes the foe 15 times.

EnragedSlash.name: Enraged Slash
EnragedSlash.desc: The user puts their rage into a strong slash. This buffs the user's attack after use.

DeathSlice.name: DeathSlice
DeathSlice.desc: The user tries to slice the foe's head with their scythe.

DecisiveSlash.name: Decisive Slash
DecisiveSlash.desc: This assertive strike becomes 50% stronger if the user is either the only one standing or with all of their allies alive

TorrentialSlash.name: Torrential Slash
TorrentialSlash.desc: The user seems to dance with the wind as they skillfully use its currents to slash the opposing side. Lower Critical chance. Higher chance to inflict Bleed.

DoubleEdged.name: DoubleEdged
DoubleEdged.desc:
It's either good or it sucks
Nothing in between

RandomSlash.name: RandomSlash
RandomSlash.desc: Slash aimlessly at a random person. Just hope it's not your ally...

StormBlade.name: Storm Blade
StormBlade.desc: The user's form distorts as it appears delayed in time, until the distorted form begins slashing at the target from all directions, with the user slowly becoming undistorted in front of the target until the form is clear as day, and the user performs the real slash on the target.

HeavySlash.name: HeavySlash
HeavySlash.desc: The user slashes with a big weapon that hits every foe, they have to rest before fighting again.

PKSlash-Pi.name: PK Slash π
PKSlash-Pi.desc: The user casts a powerful force that slashes the foe twice, sometimes in their weak spot.

PKSlash-Gamma.name: PK Slash γ
PKSlash-Gamma.desc: The user casts a powerful force that slashes the foe, sometimes in their weak spot.

AcrobaticGash.name: AcrobaticGash
AcrobaticGash.desc: The user uses their shadowy physique to disappear, reappearing above the foe with the intent to slash at them. This skill becomes more powerful based on agility buffs.

BigSmash.name: BigSmash
BigSmash.desc: The user smashes the foe with a big weapon, they have to rest before fighting again.

UltraColossalSlash.name: UltraColossalSlash
UltraColossalSlash.desc: The user strongly slashes with a huge weapon that obliterates every foe! Due to the size of the weapon they have to rest before attacking again.

UltimateSmash.name: UltimateSmash
UltimateSmash.desc: The user completely obliterates the foe with a massive weapon, they have to rest before fighting again.

CursedCyclone.name: CursedCyclone
CursedCyclone.desc: The user infuses their weapon with cursed energy, and swings with it pointing outward, creating a tornado of darkness that engulfs the foes. There is an incredibly low chance to inflict bleeding, or land a critical hit with this skill, however, this skill has a moderate chance to increase the user's agility.

ObscuredCombos.name: ObscuredCombos
ObscuredCombos.desc: The user becomes one with the shadows, slashing at the foe at unseen speeds. This skill doubles as a curse skill. There is an incredibly low chance to inflict bleeding, however, there is a moderate chance to increase the user's agility.

GalaxyChomp.name: GalaxyChomp
GalaxyChomp.desc: The user bites at a foe, causing graphics of a wolf's fangs and stars appear; the fangs crunch the foe while the stars merely look pretty. Moderate chance to daze the opponent. This skill line has an increased chance to crit.

UniverseChomp.name: UniverseChomp
UniverseChomp.desc: The user bites at a foe. Graphics of many galaxies appear for a brief second at a time before a wolf fang graphic crunches the foe. Very weak, but huge chance to crit.

DualChomp.name: DualChomp
DualChomp.desc: The user bites a foe twice, causing wolf fang graphics to crunch them; the biting from the user is what causes the damage, not the fang graphics. This skill line has an increased chance to crit.

FangedChomp.name: FangedChomp
FangedChomp.desc: The user bites at a foe, causing a graphic of wolf fangs to crunch them; this graphic is only for visual purposes and the bite that initiated it is the action that causes damage, not the graphic. This skill line has an increased chance to crit.

LightChomp.name: LightChomp
LightChomp.desc: The user bites at a foe once. This skill line has an increased chance to crit.

ButWhy.name: Check out this Gun I found, I think it's...
ButWhy.desc: WOAH LOOK I FOUND A SHOTGUN! And I want the front sea

RangedFire.name: RangedFire
RangedFire.desc: The user fires a gunshot at the foe. This has a high chance to land as a critical hit. This **Pierce Type** skill is considered **Magic**.

ZaGan.name: Za Gan
ZaGan.desc: The user fires a weapon 7 times in quick succession. It has very poor accuracy.

QuadProd.name: QuadProd
QuadProd.desc: The user swiftly thrusts their blade into the target four times with high accuracy.

AllDown.name: AllDown
AllDown.desc: Light pierce damage to all enemies.

TripleDown.name: TripleDown
TripleDown.desc: Light Pierce damage to all enemies 3x

StarThrust.name: StarThrust
StarThrust.desc: The user deftly strikes the opponent with five calculated thrusts in a star-pattern.

ZaMinigan.name: Za Minigan
ZaMinigan.desc: The user fires a full-auto weapon 15 times. It has VERY poor accuracy.

Lick.name: Lick
Lick.desc: Miniscule Pierce damage to one foe, but high chance to paralyse them.

BrainNibble.name: BrainNibble
BrainNibble.desc: The user aims a bite at the foe's head with a low chance to inflict confusion

PentaPunch.name: PentaPunch
PentaPunch.desc: The user proficiently jabs their blade into the target five times with high accuracy.

CrystalShots.name: Crystal Shots
CrystalShots.desc: The user shoots 3 sharp gems at the foe.

Impale.name: Impale
Impale.desc:
**[LAMONKA]**
The user impales the foe with a tentacle, icicle, sword or the like to deal light Physical damage, with a chance to inflict Bleeding.

HammerStrike.name: Hammer Strike
HammerStrike.desc: Take out your Hammer and slam it down upon a foe! Due to it being, well, a hammer, it's heavy and therefore won't land as often as most other skills. Should be effective when jumping on an enemy isn't possible.

3ProngedThrust.name: 3-Pronged Thrust
3ProngedThrust.desc: The user swiftly delivers three pinpoint thrusts towards the opponent.

BeerToss.name: BeerToss
BeerToss.desc: The user summons a random ass beer bottle out of nowhere. After summoning, the user just YEETS it at the opponent. this does have a decent chance to miss though. but when it doesn't, it just shatters on the opponent. the chance of bleeding is also quite high considering that the beer bottle is literally made out of glass.

SharpChomp-I.name: SharpChomp-I
SharpChomp-I.desc: A single bite directed at one foe. Has a low chance of causing Bleed.

SharpPoke.name: Sharp Poke
SharpPoke.desc: The user stabs the target with their weapon. This attack increases in power in accordance with your MP.

ProngedThrust.name: ProngedThrust
ProngedThrust.desc: The user swiftly delivers a single thrust at the opponent.

BrainSnap.name: BrainSnap
BrainSnap.desc: The user aims a bite at the foe's head with a low chance to inflict dizziness

SharpChomp-II.name: SharpChomp-II
SharpChomp-II.desc: Two bites directed at one foe. Has a low chance of causing Bleed.

HardBite.name: Hard Bite
HardBite.desc: The user bites into their target. This has a chance to cause bleeding.

CorkShot.name: CorkShot
CorkShot.desc: Shoot a cork out of your gun to deal moderate damage to an enemy.

NegativePowerTest.name: NegativePowerTest
NegativePowerTest.desc: Test of negative power, and maybe other things. Harc basically grabbed a random skill made from the `rpg!registerskill` command and he just pasted it to this lmao

RevengeBite.name: Revenge Bite
RevengeBite.desc: A single bite directed at one foe. This move becomes 1.5 times stronger if the user is alone, or all of their allies are down.

RunNGun.name: Run n' Gun
RunNGun.desc: The user quickly pierces the enemy, this skill deals damage using the user's AGL.

GleamingFire.name: GleamingFire
GleamingFire.desc: A flurry of 4 crystals are shot at the opposing side, hitting random opponents.

WolfBite.name: WolfBite
WolfBite.desc: The user bites a single foe twice.

ThinStab.name: ThinStab
ThinStab.desc: The user stabs the foe lightly.

PKStab-Beta.name: PK Stab β
PKStab-Beta.desc: The user casts a force that stabs the foe and often makes them bleed.

PKStab-Alpha.name: PK Stab α
PKStab-Alpha.desc: The user casts a force that stabs the foe and may make them bleed.

Sex.name: Sex
Sex.desc: The user decides to get into the good mood and they do the POWER OF THE THUMPING to defeat the enemy

HellThrust.name: Hell Thrust
HellThrust.desc: The user deals 2-4 heavy Pierce attacks on one foe with a chance to decrease their Endurance

OneHandedThrust.name: One-Handed Thrust
OneHandedThrust.desc: The user takes a relatively shorter sword, be it a dagger or otherwise, and swiftly thrusts it into the opponent. This attack increases power in accordance with your MP.

CruelAssault.name: Cruel Assault
CruelAssault.desc: Heavy Pierce damage to one foe. Can land Critical Hits more easily. May inflict Bleed.

BrainBite.name: Brain Bite
BrainBite.desc: The user aims a bite at the foe's head with a low chance to inflict confusion

TridentStrike.name: Trident Strike
TridentStrike.desc: The user uses their trident to strike the foe. This skill has a small chance to inflict Bleed.

DexterousSkewer.name: Dexterous Skewer
DexterousSkewer.desc: The user wields their blade skillfully, before then piercing the opponent with it so quickly they won't notice until a second or two later. This attack increases in power in accordance with your MP.

HeavyShot.name: Heavy Shot
HeavyShot.desc: A sharp object strikes the foe to deal heavy pierce damage.

AccuratePuncture.name: AccuratePuncture
AccuratePuncture.desc: The user stabs the foe with a big weapon, they have to rest before fighting again.

SilkStrike.name: SilkStrike
SilkStrike.desc: The user strikes with their weapon, tied to silk. This skill has a chance to debuff the foe's agility.

Stab.name: Stab
Stab.desc: Strike the foe with a sharp object, with a higher chance to land as a critical hit, and a low chance to inflict bleeding.

RapierStrike.name: Rapier Strike
RapierStrike.desc: The user uses their rapier to strike the foe. This skill has a moderate chance to inflict bleeding.

Pralaya.name: Pralaya
Pralaya.desc: A sharp object strikes the foe to deal severe pierce damage.

DeepestStab.name: DeepestStab
DeepestStab.desc: The user stabs the foe critically deeply and may cause bleeding.

FlawlessPuncture.name: FlawlessPuncture
FlawlessPuncture.desc: The user flawlessly stabs the foe with a massive weapon, they have to rest before fighting again.

ShockChomp.name: ShockChomp
ShockChomp.desc: The user bites at a foe, causing a graphic of wolf fangs to appear and crunch them. This skill is notable as it has an affiliation with electricity even though none is expelled or used; this is merely due to the chance to daze the foe, albeit low. This skill line has an increased chance to crit.

Mawisp.name: Mawisp
Mawisp.desc: The user summons a weak moderately-sized explosion under the opposing team.

Wisp.name: Wisp
Wisp.desc: The user uses their magic to summon a small explosion below the enemy.

Mavisp.name: Mavisp
Mavisp.desc: The user ignites their hands and claps them together, causing a weak moderately-sized explosion to damage the enemy team.

Visp.name: Visp
Visp.desc: The user ignites their hand and attacks the opponent with it, causing a small explosion.

Mawispana.name: Mawispana
Mawispana.desc: The user ignites a large explosion under the opposing team.

Wispana.name: Wispana
Wispana.desc: The user uses their magic to summon a moderate explosion below the enemy.

Flashbang.name: Flashbang
Flashbang.desc: The user launches a stun grenade at the foes, probably dazing the foes.

RHAE01.name: <:Wii_Disc:969134688729960468> Wii Play
RHAE01.desc:
Title ID: RHAE01

Wii Play. Do you?
''Is that a threat?''
What's more entertaining than a tank being summoned to shoot a foe in the face? I can't think of any answers for that one.

PKBoom-Alpha.name: PK Boom α
PKBoom-Alpha.desc: The user casts explosive energy that explodes as it hits the foe and may debuff their endurance.

Mahug.name: Mahug
Mahug.desc: The user hugs the foe. Little did the foe know the user has some grenades on him, exploding the user and all the foes.

ExplodingKnee.name: Exploding Knee
ExplodingKnee.desc: A skill from a certain human girl who's great at martial arts.

Mawispiten.name: Mawispiten
Mawispiten.desc: An extrememly powerful wave of explosive energy is unleashed underneath the opposing side to cause severe damage.

Mavispiten.name: Mavispiten
Mavispiten.desc: Vicious red energy flows from the user's fists, which shortly sends an explosion of force at the opposing side at a severe level.

Vispiten.name: Vispiten
Vispiten.desc: The user allows an almighty powerful explosion dwell into their fist before unleashing it into the face of their opponent in a huge effort of strength.

Wispiten.name: Wispiten
Wispiten.desc: The user unleashes a huge explosion from under the opponent's own feet, entrapping and harming the foe severely.

Mahugdyne.name: Mahugdyne
Mahugdyne.desc: The user hugs the foe. Little did the foe know the user has some nukes on him, exploding the user and all the foes.

Hug.name: Hug
Hug.desc: The user walks up to the target in a defenseless manner, and hugs the target. LITTLE DOES THE TARGET KNOW, THE HUG GENERATES THE ENERGY OF 1000 SUNS AND SPONTANEOUSLY RELEASES IT IN ONE GIANT EXPLOSION. The user also gets caught up in their own explosion, fainting them in the process.

spreadverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a spread aura

FireRay.name: FireRay
FireRay.desc: The user fires a constant ray of fire at the foe.

FireSpam.name: FireSpam
FireSpam.desc: The user fires 5 balls of fire at the foe.

FireBeam.name: FireBeam
FireBeam.desc: The user fires a beam of fire at the foe.

FireFlowerRush.desc: [Exclusive to the Fire Flower] A hand-thrown barrage of bouncing fireballs at all enemies. Slight chance to cause BURN. (Note that while it hits multiple times, damage is only calculated once all fireballs have been thrown.)

FlareTomb.name: FlareTomb
FlareTomb.desc: Reluctantly hit the target with even more flames, causing the user to rest

FlameBlast.name: FlameBlast
FlameBlast.desc: The user, you guessed it, blasts the opponent with flames. Has a 0% Chance to inflict Burn.

FieryFastball.desc: Forms a ball of energy in the shape of an eighth note and throws it at the opponent.  May cause Burn.

EAgiverse.name: EAgiverse
EAgiverse.desc: Purchase this DLC to employ an orange aura of Limit Break around the foes

powerverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a power aura

Spali.name: Spali
Spali.desc: A more burning version of Maragi, but less powerful, but less costly.

Firebrand.name: Firebrand
Firebrand.desc: A spark of instant flame granted from a sun god. This move cannot crit, but it has a fairly high chance to burn and a moderate chance to debuff the foe's ATK.

FlameCurse.name: Flame Curse
FlameCurse.desc: Weak fire skill with very high burn chance.

FireBall.name: FireBall
FireBall.desc: The user fires a ball of fire at the foe.

Ralagi.name: Ralagi
Ralagi.desc: Light fire damage to one random target.

MarEAgion.name: MarEAgion
MarEAgion.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple medium Fire damage

FlameFistSeven.name: Flame Fist Seven (F.F.S)
FlameFistSeven.desc: The seventh revision of Flame Fist, although something tells me that there isnt a Flame Fist 1-6 and that this was just named for an FFS joke...

FireBurst.name: FireBurst
FireBurst.desc: The user, you guessed it, bursts the opponent with fire. Has a 1% Chance to inflict **Burn**.

Linge.name: Linge
Linge.desc: The user does some laundry. This is because according to Google, Linge is French for 'Laundry'. This tires out the user, and since there is so much laundry to do, they eventually take out their frustration on the enemy by setting the laundry on fire, and throwing at the enemy in 4 seperate piles. May inflict Burn on the enemy, and has an 80% chance to debuff the user's Endurance.

Dry.name: Dry
Dry.desc: A more powerful version of Maragi, but with a higher cost and no burn chance.

Spalido.name: Spalido
Spalido.desc: A more burning version of Maragion, but less costly, less powerful, and lowered accuracy.

FireDance.name: Fire Dance
FireDance.desc: Inflicts moderate Fire damage 2-5 times on a random enemy

Maragiverse.name: Maragiverse
Maragiverse.desc: The user employs a bright orange aura on the battlefield to triple LB% gained for both allies and enemies.

powerverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a power aura

FireTriangle.name: FireTriangle
FireTriangle.desc: The user summons a simple fire triangle to burn the enemy.

Agiverse.name: Agiverse
Agiverse.desc: The user employs an orange aura around the foes to double LB% gained.

powerverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a power aura

SnapFingers.name: SnapFingers
SnapFingers.desc: Snap your fingers in order to cause a storm of fire that hits all enemies

FireFlurrySixty.name: Fire Flurry Sixty (F.F.S)
FireFlurrySixty.desc: The user punches the opponent up to 5 times with flaming fists, however they also sacrifice themselves along with a huge chunk of energy. This one is definitely an FFS joke.

Porta-Inferno.name: Porta-Inferno
Porta-Inferno.desc: The user, you guessed it, throws a portable inferno at the enemy, which hits them **3** times. Has a 5% Chance to inflict **Burn**.

FirePledge.name: Fire Pledge
FirePledge.desc: A column of fire hits the target.

BurningHex.name: Burning Hex
BurningHex.desc: The user sets their foes alight with green flames. This skill has a high burn chance.

FireStorm.name: FireStorm
FireStorm.desc: The user fires a storm of fire that hits random enemies 30 times.

WoundBurn.name: WoundBurn
WoundBurn.desc: The user burns a wound on the opponent's body, with a small chance to inflict **Burn**. This skill is based on Wound To Heal (Power and Cost-wise, anyway.).               Also Verwex there's a typo in wound to heal's description it says would

FlameShot.name: FlameShot
FlameShot.desc: The user channels the flames around them and fires off an arrowhead of flame at the opponent. This skill has a higher chance of burn.

Abyss.name: Abyss
Abyss.desc: One of the spells of a certain doppelganger. It is an echo skill of Fireball.

MolotovToss.name: Molotov Toss

ToastedSands.name: Toasted Sands
ToastedSands.desc: The user blows burning hot sand at it's opponent.

AllOutShove.name: AllOutShove
AllOutShove.desc: The user pretty much runs toward the target, Kinda preparing a headbutt. but using both Head and Fists (With the fists coated in fire) to hit the target with.

BlazeKick.name: Blaze Kick
BlazeKick.desc: The user ignites their feet and strikes the opponent. This move has a very high critical hit rate. This move may burn the opponent.

Ralagilao.name: Ralagilao
Ralagilao.desc: Medium fire damage to one random target.

FlamingSlam.name: FlamingSlam

PKFire-Beta.name: PK Fire β

FlarePunch.name: Flare Punch

Fireburst.name: Fireburst
Fireburst.desc: A Direct upgrade for Fire Ball! Summoning a rather large ball of flames in the user hands, they chuck it towards their target! The Chance of burning is a bit low.

FireFang.name: Fire Fang
FireFang.desc: The user imbues flames into their fangs and bite into the target. Has a moderate chance to burn the target.

Spaligan.name: Spaligan
Spaligan.desc: A more burning version of Maragidyne, but less powerful, lower cost, and lower accuracy.

PSIFire-Sigma.name: PSIFire-Sigma
PSIFire-Sigma.desc: Fire bursts from the user's fingers and all enemies take major damage (to simulate a row of enemies being hit).

MonkeyBomb.name: Monkey Bomb
MonkeyBomb.desc: The user throws a Cymbal Monkey with a bomb strapped to it that plays a tune, to distract the enemies from battle completely, before exploding. Sometimes it works.

PKFire-Pi.name: PK Fire π
PKFire-Pi.desc: The user fires blazing powerful flames at every foe, usually burning them.

FlameStrike.name: Flame Strike
FlameStrike.desc: A Direct Upgrade from Flamethrower! Kicking up a large flame, the user kicks it towards the target! Yet still a low chance of Burning the target.

FireCrack.name: FireCrack
FireCrack.desc: The user fires a powerful blast of fire to the foe that may burn and debuff their endurance.

IllfatedFlares.name: Ill-fated Flares
IllfatedFlares.desc: The user swings their weapon, item or equipment to set the target alight. This skill has a low chance of inflicting burn, but also is able to deal technical damage to burning foes.

InfernalFlames.name: Infernal Flames
InfernalFlames.desc: Deal heavy Fire damage to allies and enemies

Ralagidyne.name: Ralagidyne
Ralagidyne.desc: Heavy fire damage to one random target.

ConflagrationPummel.name: Conflagration Pummel

FireTornado.name: Fire Tornado

Overheat.name: Overheat

FuryRedGlare.name: FuryRedGlare

PSIFire-Omega.desc: Fire bursts from the user's fingers and all enemies take major damage (to simulate a row of enemies being hit).

FlamingFist.name: FlamingFist
FlamingFist.desc: The user coats their fist in flames and strikes at full force. This skill has a chance to burn the foe.

Crysplan.name: Crysplan
Crysplan.desc: A more powerful version of Agidyne, but has a higher cost and no burn chance.

BlueFlare.name: Blue Flare

Dryeldo.name: Dryeldo

Cryspendo.name: Cryspendo

PyroBall.name: Pyro Ball

BlazeLog.name: Blaze Log

ElementalBeam.name: Elemental Beam

WaterShuriken.name: WaterShuriken

Flaves.name: Flaves

Hydragi.name: Hydragi

Ralaqua.name: Ralaqua
Ralaqua.desc: Light water damage to one random target.

MalEAques.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple medium Water damage

EAques.name: EAques

Wave.name: Wave

Ralaques.name: Ralaques

The user casts the forces of nature attacking the foe.

A healing aura will lay on the attacked foe and will heal any future attacker 20% of the damage dealt.

healverse: %ENEMY% is now shrowded in a healing aura

The user casts the forces of nature attacking the foe.
The forces are stronger if the user is not alone.

Curiosity.name: Curiosity
Curiosity.desc: Nate tried to test something, but it didn't work. This skill is the aftermath.

EternalGravegrowing.name: EternalGravegrowing
EternalGravegrowing.desc: The user sends out an endless wave of nature, anything you can imagine, with enough power to damage an enemy deeply. Bypasses shields like Makarakarn, Tetrakarn, regular shields, etc., just like Almighty does, but will still consider affinities in question.

PlasmaCannon.name: PlasmaCannon
PlasmaCannon.desc: The user fires 15 psychic bullets at the foe.

AuraSphereShower.name: Aura Sphere [Shower]
AuraSphereShower.desc:
The user channels most of their energy, creating tons of energy balls above a foe. They then cross arms, meeting at the wrists, before throwing their arms upward and then back down. This sends all of the energy balls crashing down upon the foe. The energy balls in question have explosive properties and are easy to make, but not all that powerful. Every subsequent sphere that hits the opponent will be less powerful than the last. This skill cannot crit.

While the energy balls are easy to make, this skill consumes a lot of the user's MP. Be careful about this; manage your MP properly!

AuraSphereShowerV.name: Aura Sphere [Shower Volley]
AuraSphereShowerV.desc:
The user channels most of their energy, creating tons of energy balls above all foes. They then cross arms, meeting at the wrists, before throwing their arms upward and then back down. This sends all of the energy balls crashing down upon the enemies. The energy balls in question have explosive properties and are easy to make, but not all that powerful. Every subsequent sphere that hits the opponent will be less powerful than the last. This skill cannot crit.

While the energy balls are easy to make, this skill consumes an absolute ton of the user's MP. Be careful about this; manage your MP properly!

Memes.name: Memes
Memes.desc: Memes. The DNA of the soul. They shape our will. They are the culture — they are everything we pass on. Expose someone to anger long enough, they will learn to hate. They become a carrier. Envy, greed, despair… All memes. All passed along.

MapsEA.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple light Psychic damage

AuraSphereBurstV.name: Aura Sphere [Burst Volley]

The energy balls have explosive properties and are easy to make, but not all that powerful.

PsEA.name: PsEA

AuraSphereBurst.name: Aura Sphere [Burst]

The energy balls have explosive properties and are easy to make, but not all that powerful.

Modified by <:passive:962465469942616074>SpiritCharge.

BrokenDebilitizer.name: BrokenDebilitizer
BrokenDebilitizer.desc: The user shoots an unstable debilitating beam, hopefully temporarily debuffing the foe's ATK and MAG.

CopySelf.name: Copy Self
CopySelf.desc: The caster creates a copy of themselves. The copy is only half as powerful as the caster

Peelout.name: Peelout
Peelout.desc: The user moves their legs in a circular pattern while being stationary, then they turn the potential energy gathered into kinetic energy.
